rows.label: tev017501_MSG0001
rows.name:
My professional specialty was in outer space mineral
research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0002
rows.name:
But as a hobby, I used to process stones,
make accessories out of them, and sell them locally.
I was actually somewhat well-known for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0003
rows.name:
It didn't take long before I was making more money at
my hobby than my real job. So when we arrived here
on Mira, I started the business up again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0004
rows.name:
But then I discovered Mira has minerals that are harder
than diamonds. Now I'm researching Mira's minerals so
I can learn to work with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0010
rows.name:
That Shingo kid told me about a Ma-non craftsman
named Jeshero who was able to process the minerals
he found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I went to see him ASAP and came away impressed.
Those Ma-non really are incredible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0012
rows.name:
They can freely work any mineral as if it was clay,
no matter how hard it actually is. And they do so
without causing a single imperfection![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0013
rows.name:
The moment I saw that, I asked Jeshero to let me
apprentice under him. Now he's teaching me all sorts
of crazy things! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017501_MSG0014
rows.name:
The next time you see that Shingo kid, tell him to come
find me. I'll make whatever he wants out of any rock he
throws my way.[ST:wait ]
